abstract: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn has made the winning bid to buy the bankrupt and unfinished Fontainebleau Las Vegas resort.
snippet: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn has made the winning bid to buy the bankrupt and unfinished Fontainebleau Las Vegas resort.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn has made the winning bid to buy the bankrupt and unfinished Fontainebleau Las Vegas resort. According to court papers filed in Miami, the bankruptcy examiner in charge of running a court-supervised auction of the Fontainebleau said the only qualified bid received for the Fontainebleau was from Icahn Nevada Gaming Acquisition L.L.C., Reuters reports

headline.main: Icahn Wins in Bid for Las Vegas Resort
